description: Delete a time card approval audit.
permissions: User must be an admin or a time card auditor for the time card broker, and the audit must be deletable (no time card invoices).
side_effects: Deletes the time card approval audit record.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (time card approval audit ID) and --confirm. Deletion is blocked when the time card has invoices.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to delete the audit.
